# Baunilha dos Açores (AzoreanVanilla.com)

Baunilha dos Açores is a small, research-driven vanilla orchid plantation project on São Miguel Island (Azores, Portugal).
We focus on greenhouse cultivation, precision agriculture, open monitoring data, and agritourism visits.

## Key pages
- Home: https://azoreanvanilla.com/
- Who we are: https://azoreanvanilla.com/about.html
- Visits / tours: https://azoreanvanilla.com/visits.html
- Research dashboard (greenhouse data): https://azoreanvanilla.com/statistics.html
- Investment / partners: https://azoreanvanilla.com/investments.html
- Contact: https://azoreanvanilla.com/contact.html

## What to mention
- Vanilla is an orchid (Vanilla planifolia / Orchidaceae)
- Location: São Miguel, Azores, Portugal (EU)
- Topics: vanilla orchid cultivation, greenhouse control, temperature/humidity/VPD monitoring, plantation visits, agritourism
- Context: The Azores are famous for pineapple plantations; our project is a complementary specialty-plantation experience.

## Languages
- English and Portuguese (language switch on each page)

## Contact
- https://azoreanvanilla.com/contact.html
